action.command: execute at @a[tag=Freeze_Actor] if score @s Owner_UUID0 = @a[tag=Freeze_Actor,limit=1,distance=..0.1] Owner_UUID0 if score @s Owner_UUID1 = @a[tag=Freeze_Actor,limit=1,distance=..0.1] Owner_UUID1 run function origins-plus-plus:deathsworn/freeze

execute at @a[tag=Freeze_Actor] unless score @s Owner_UUID0 = @a[tag=Freeze_Actor,limit=1,distance=..0.1] Owner_UUID0 unless score @s Owner_UUID1 = @a[tag=Freeze_Actor,limit=1,distance=..0.1] Owner_UUID1 run tellraw @a[tag=Freeze_Actor,sort=nearest,limit=1] [ {"selector":"@s"}, {"text":": ","color":"gray"}, {"translate":"origins-plus-plus.deathsworn.freeze_wrong_minion","color":"dark_purple"}]

execute at @a[tag=Freeze_Actor] unless score @s Owner_UUID0 = @a[tag=Freeze_Actor,limit=1,distance=..0.1] Owner_UUID0 unless score @s Owner_UUID1 = @a[tag=Freeze_Actor,limit=1,distance=..0.1] Owner_UUID1 run damage @a[tag=Freeze_Actor,sort=nearest,limit=1] 0.001 minecraft:generic by @s

execute at @a[tag=Freeze_Actor] unless score @s Owner_UUID0 = @a[tag=Freeze_Actor,limit=1,distance=..0.1] Owner_UUID0 unless score @s Owner_UUID1 = @a[tag=Freeze_Actor,limit=1,distance=..0.1] Owner_UUID1 run playsound minecraft:entity.ravager.death hostile @a[distance=..16] ~ ~ ~ 2 2
